statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT Product_Name, Sales_Amount FROM SalesData WHERE Sales_Amount > 1000
SELECT Customer_ID, Sales_Amount, Sales_Date FROM SalesData ORDER BY Sales_Date DESC
SELECT Store_ID, SUM(Sales_Amount) AS Total_Sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY Store_ID
SELECT Product_ID, Product_Name, Sales_Amount FROM SalesData WHERE Customer_ID = 1
SELECT Product_Name, Sales_Amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY Sales_Amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE Customer_ID = 100 AND Store_ID = 1;
SELECT Product_ID, Product_Name, Sales_Date FROM SalesData WHERE Sales_Amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT Customer_ID, COUNT(Store_ID) AS Store_Count FROM SalesData GROUP BY Customer_ID HAVING COUNT(Store_ID) > 2;
SELECT Store_ID, SUM(Sales_Amount) AS Total_Sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY Store_ID ORDER BY Total_Sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount, purchase_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_name, purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount, purchase_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'Ap%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trends_count FROM trends_analysis GROUP BY trend_name HAVING trends_count > 1 ORDER BY trends_count DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_address='New York';
SELECT trend_name, forecast_value FROM trend_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_address LIKE '%St.%';
SELECT trend_name, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM trend_forecast WHERE forecast_value BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_id, forecast_value FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY product_name DESC

SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, price FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id JOIN forecasts ON sales.product_id = forecasts.product_id WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.category_name, p.product_name, s.sale_amount FROM categories c JOIN products p ON c.category_id = p.category_id JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT f.forecast_date, p.product_name, f.forecast_quantity FROM forecasts f JOIN products p ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.forecast_quantity > 100 ORDER BY f.forecast_date ASC;
